metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2301 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Over-read in GitHub repository hpjansson/chafa prior to 1.10.3.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2301` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chafa - 1.12.3-1
libchafa0 - 1.12.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chafa package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.3-1').
